Package me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.argument.type

Class ValueArgument

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.argument.Argument
      • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.argument.InputArgument
        • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.argument.type.ValueArgument
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelArgument, MentionArgument, NumberArgument, RoleArgument, StringArgument, URLArgument
    public class ValueArgument
extends InputArgument
    Represents an argument that accepts a specified type of value

    The value can be validated with regex by specifying a validator with validate(String)}

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ValueArgument​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, org.javacord.api.interaction.SlashCommandOptionType type)

      ValueArgument​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, org.javacord.api.interaction.SlashCommandOptionType type, java.lang.Class<?> resultType)
      Runs the default constructor and specifies the result type of the value, that the input will be converted to

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid​(java.lang.Object input)
        If validator is set checks the user input if it's valid for the argument or not
        Parameters:
        input - the user input
        Returns:
        true if validator is not set if validator is set then true or false depends on the validation process result
